description: An illustration of a transistor radio with a light brown and a gray antenna extending outwards diagonally from the top left over the radio. There are three long, horizontal, dark brown rectangles on the front of the radio representing the speaker; a dial above the speaker grills on the right; and a display to the left of the dial showing the wavebands the radio is capable of receiving. The display has a red indicator line on the second of four notches in the display.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
